name: Blink Twice If You're Able To Breathe
name_original: Blink Twice If You're Able To Breathe
description:
You have a place you need to be.

But first, go down the layers of your mind to make sure you want to be there.

(Also: differently colored walls are interactive. Go talk to them and act like talking to walls is normal.)

---

Contains: First-game awkwardness, minimalist-ish graphics, semi-unoriginal plot, "puzzles" that are completely optional, some grammar slip-ups I forgot to check, and a single(?) ending.

Content Warnings: Medical procedures, mentioned violence, kind-of flashing imagery, and general disturbing content later down the line. You've been warned.

---

Bitsy is made by Adam Le Doux. Go support him!
